lead_paragraph: The Giants’ winning drive Sunday was kept alive by a dramatic pass play. They faced third-and-5 from their 44-yard line with 1 minute 15 seconds left and the Patriots leading, 14-10.
snippet: The Giants’ winning drive Sunday was kept alive by a dramatic pass play. They faced third-and-5 from their 44-yard line with 1 minute 15 seconds left and the Patriots leading, 14-10.
